reasoning_steps: Step 1: Opened the provided input.xlsx and mapped each guidance column (C:AH) to its earnings release date (Row 3), event (Row 4), and the applicable full-year guidance period (Row 6).

Step 2: For each earnings date where ADT provided full-year guidance, pulled the full-year guidance ranges (low/high) for Total Revenue, Adjusted EBITDA, Adjusted EPS, and Adjusted Free Cash Flow (before special items / including swaps as disclosed) from ADT investor relations earnings release pages, ensuring the guidance year matched Row 6 (e.g., FY 2025 guidance updated at 1Q/2Q/3Q 2025 and initiated at 4Q 2024).

Step 3: Entered only hardcoded numeric low/high values into the green-highlighted cells on the Guidance sheet (blue font for inputs). Left cells blank where guidance was not provided in the source disclosures (notably earlier periods and where FCF/EPS guidance was not disclosed in the required format).
